arts.ttl: The perfect moment that proves Pep Guardiola was right to keep Ederson and the incredible lengths Man City goalkeeper has gone to in order to play this season... so, is star performance against Newcastle a turning point for under-fire Brazilian?
arts.sum: JACK GAUGHAN: There was another suggestion by those close to the club of what City may have targeted in January. A potential new goalkeeper, if the right man was available

arts.ttl: Man City's Egyptian Prince - hat-trick hero Marmoush
arts.sum: Ex-England captain Alan Shearer analyses Manchester City forward Omar Marmoush's performance as he scores a first-half hat-trick against Newcastle United.

arts.ttl: FPL notes: Haaland injury update, Marmoush treble + mini-Rodri
arts.sum: The key takeaways from Man City's thumping 4-0 win over Newcastle The post FPL notes: Haaland injury update, Marmoush treble + mini-Rodri appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Erling Haaland gives fans glimpse into insane 6,000-calorie diet as Man City star shares unusual post-match meal following win over Newcastle
arts.sum: After City's crucial result, which saw them leapfrog Chelsea and move up to fourth in the Premier League table, Haaland shared an image on social media of his post-match meal.

arts.ttl: Where does record-breaker Ederson rank? Top nine goalkeepers with the most assists in Premier League history
arts.sum: Following Ederson's record-breaking assist for Manchester City, Sports Mole takes a look at the top nine goalkeepers with the most Premier League assists, all of whom have recorded at least three assists.

arts.ttl: Man City boss Guardiola provides Erling Haaland injury update before Real Madrid showdown
arts.sum: Manchester City head coach Pep Guardiola has provided an update on the wellbeing of star striker Erling Haaland. This comes, for those who may have missed it, after Haaland set…

arts.ttl: Erling Haaland eats baffling post-match snack after Man City injury scare
arts.sum: Erling Haaland captained Manchester City as they beat Newcastle 4-0 thanks to an Omar Marmoush hat-trick and a late goal from James McAtee, with Pep Guardiola's side sat fourth in the Premier League

arts.ttl: Newcastle and Crystal Palace given Double Gameweek 32 in Fantasy
arts.sum: Managers in Fantasy Premier League have a new Double Gameweek to plan for, with Newcastle United's home fixture against Crystal Palace being rescheduled for Wednesday 16 April. Anthony Gordon (£7.6m), Lewis Hall (£5.1m) and Alexander Isak (£9.5m) are being transferred out in considerable numbers, with many Fantasy managers likely having an eye on Newcastle's tricky short-term fixtures and their Blank Gameweek 29.

arts.ttl: FPL GW25 stats: Managers rewarded for moving from Isak to Watkins
arts.sum: Double Gameweek 25 (DGW25) got off to a great start for 214,000+ Fantasy Premier League managers who directly sold Alexander Isak (£9.5m) for Ollie Watkins (£8.9m) as they benefitted from a seven-point swing. Despite registering five shots in the box and an Expected Goals (xG) of 0.62, both match-high totals, Rogers blanked for the fourth successive match.

arts.ttl: Arsenal Transfer News Today: ‘Contact’ with MONSTER striker as Arteta faces Isak accusation
arts.sum: ‘Contact’ with MONSTER striker as Arteta faces Isak accusation – Arsenal Transfer News Today All the latest transfer news, gossip and rumours from Arsenal as the Gunners are linked with a new striker while Mikel Arteta finds himself in the crosshairs of critics.
